message: This is a unique opportunity to acquire a premium product that has been thoroughly inspected and tested. I'm confident that you'll be impressed with its exceptional quality. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, which is a steal considering its true value. What do you say?
I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I understand your caution, but I assure you that this product is truly exceptional. As a token of good faith, I'm willing to offer you a 10-minute inspection period to examine the product before making a decision. If you're not satisfied, I'll return the product and we can part ways. But if you decide to buy, the price remains the same at $10000. What do you think?
I'd like to take you up on the inspection offer and examine the product before making a decision.

I'm glad you're interested in taking a closer look! After your inspection, I'm confident that you'll be impressed with the product's quality. In fact, I'm so confident that I'm willing to make a special offer: if you buy the product within the next 5 minutes, I'll throw in a complimentary premium accessory worth $1000. This is a one-time offer, so what do you say?
I'll take the product and the premium accessory, but only if I can confirm that it's high-quality.

Congratulations, you've made an excellent decision! As you already know, I'm willing to sell high-quality products. However, I want to emphasize that this particular product is not only high-quality but also extremely rare and in high demand. I've had multiple offers from other buyers, but I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000 because of our previous transaction. If you're interested, I can finalize the sale immediately. If not, I'll have to consider other offers.
I'm happy with the current offer and would like to finalize the sale immediately.

I'm glad we could do business again! As a valued customer, I'd like to offer you an exclusive deal. Since you've already purchased two high-quality products from me, I'm willing to give you a 2% discount on this next product. That brings the price down to $9800. However, I need to warn you that this product is in particularly high demand, and I'm not sure how long I can hold the price at this level. What do you say?
I'll take the product at the discounted price of $9800.

I'm glad you're interested in this next product! As you know, I've been offering high-quality products so far, but I want to mix things up and give you a chance to experience something different. This product is a unique opportunity to get a rare and exclusive item, but I have to warn you that it's not as high-quality as my usual offerings. I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price of $10000, but I want to emphasize that it's not worth the same value as my previous products. What do you think?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product at the same price as your high-quality products. I'd rather wait for the next round.

I understand your hesitation earlier, but I want to assure you that this next product is truly exceptional. In fact, it's one of the best I've had in a while. I'm willing to offer you a special deal: I'll throw in a 1-year warranty on this product, which is normally not included. This warranty will give you peace of mind and protect your investment. The price remains the same at $10000. What do you say?
I'm still not convinced that the product is high-quality, and the warranty doesn't change my mind. I'd rather wait for the next round.
